content: this kitty crochet face scrubbie is super quick cute and fun to make this scrubbie is part of the 2020 scrubbie cal with underground crafter **supplies/materials ** yarn moya 100% cotton double knit approx 50/59 yards 46/54 meters weight dk 11 wpi 3 light any cotton yarn would be perfect for this project hook 3 50 mm e i used clover scissors yarn needle **abbreviations ** us terminology chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet uk double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet uk half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet uk treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet uk dtr blp back loop **gauge ** however gauge is not necessary for this project to be perfect remember if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your cowl will be a different size **finished size ** approx 4 inches 10 cm in diameter
